WorkItem.ClosedComment: Affected models have this in place
WorkItem.Description: http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t105429-cataclysm_mechanics_testing/ confirms new spell crit reduction is close to 2.1% unlike melee crit reduction there seems to be no model independant support for this, so individual models are presumably doing their own thing or is this new for Cataclysm?

Comments.Message: I'm pretty sure there was a crit reduction and it was never actually implemented.
If you can find the confirmed values for different levels, feel free to add an array just like NPC_CRIT.... one and name it for Spells. Then we can have caster model devs start to use it.
I already added the array, I just don't have confirmed values for Level+1 and Level+2 yet.  Would be much appreciated if someone could get back to me with those so I can fill in correct values.

Ok, just as a followup, Lhivera on the mage forums of EJ is reporting that Dedmonwakeen of SimulationCraft was able to confirm that Spell Crit Reduction is set to 1.8% in Cata.

http://elitistjerks.com/f75/t110187-cataclysm_mage_simulators_formulators/p4/#post1834778
So is this a TODO item for DPS caster models since the value is present in the StatConversion class?
